member.name: T:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap
member.summary: GridSnap class manages the toolbar and commands to quick change the grid and snap settings in AutoCAD.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.Initialize
member.summary: AutoCAD calls this method to initialize the extension.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.Terminate
member.summary: AutoCAD calls this method to terminate the extension.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_0_01_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 0.01mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_0_05_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 0.05mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_0_1_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 0.1mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_0_5_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 0.5mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_1_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 1mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_5_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 5mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_10_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 10mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_50_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 50mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_100_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 100mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_500_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 500mm.

member.name: M:GridSnapToolbar.GridSnap.SnapUnit_1000_Command
member.summary: Method to set the grid and snap to 1000mm. (1m)
